name: Eraser Run
description:
You have one goal in Eraser Run – Don’t Get Erased!

Jump over wildlife, duck under magically floating bricks, and run faster than the eraser for as long as your ninja fast (or turtle slow) reflexes allow you! Unlike most endless runners, in Eraser Run you must control your speed! But be careful, if you try to go too fast you will fall face first and get erased! If you go to slow the eraser will get you! Play against your friends’ scores as well as the highest scores around the world! How long can you run before you get erased?
